alert.note: Alert for Ontonagon (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 17 at 2:37PM EST until January 18 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 4 inches, lowest east of M-26 and south of Rockland. Locally higher amounts up to 6 inches are expected over the Porkies and along M-26 between Rockland and Toivola, especially near Greenland. * WHERE...Ontonagon County. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact this evening`s and Thursday morning`s commute. The cold wind chills as low as 15 below zero could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
